text: Jyotirmoy Bhattacharya is an Indian art curator and film maker based in Kolkata, India. He has curated shows with Akbar Padamsee Jogen Chowdhury S. G. Vasudev Subhaprasanna and other notable artists. He has organized art camps of eminent artists in India and outside.He has curated numerous shows in Bangalore where he was based before he moved back to Kolkata. He lives with his wife and son in Kolkata. == Curated projects == # 'Babu and Bibi bronzes' by Lalu Prasad Shaw, 2017 # "An ode to the epic, Mahabharata" 2019 #"Black & White" -by Jogen Chowdhury & S.
